question: What will be the high temperature in [CITY] on [DATE]?
description: Predict the daily high temperature in [CITY]. Current forecast: [CURRENT_FORECAST]째C
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the official high temperature recorded at [WEATHER_STATION] on [DATE].

The final temperature will be rounded to the nearest whole degree Celsius for settlement.
[WEATHER_SOURCE] will be used as the primary data source.
In case of discrepancies, the local meteorological office reading will be used.
Market range: [MIN_VALUE]째C - [MAX_VALUE]째C
